p: The objective of this study was to survey the mosquito fauna of two conservation areas in the metropolitan region of Belo Horizonte, the capital of the state of Minas Gerais, Brazil, and to evaluate the viral presence of yellow fever virus (YFV), dengue virus (DENV), chikungunya virus (CHIKV), Zika virus (ZIKV) and mayaro virus (MAYV).
